User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the OmniCopy AI platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (matches Firebase Auth UID).

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

creditBalance.description: The number of credits the user has available.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

id.description: Unique identifier for the product description.

userId.description: Reference to the User who generated this product description.

title.description: The generated title for the product.

description.description: The generated HTML description for the product.

shortDescription.description: The generated short description for the product.

metaDescription.description: The generated meta description for the product.

tags.description: The generated tags for the product.

platform.description: The platform for which the description was generated (e.g., Shopify, WooCommerce).

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the product description was generated.

inputData.description: JSON object containing the product data input used to generate this description

definition.description: Stores user profiles. Only the authenticated user can access their own profile.
Stores product descriptions generated by the user. Only the owner can access them.
